column1: Smoque BBQ////ok so Im sorry but I dont really get this place. i didnt like the food
column2: at all. The meat was tender enough
column3: but definitely didnt have the delish smokey flavour that one wants from bbq. The mac and cheese was rather insipid
column4: the best that one can say for it is that it was browned and crispy on top and that made it worth while.
